title: DIH - FileDataSource & FieldReaderDataSource should default to UTF-8 charset
description: FileDataSource & FieldReaderDataSource have optional "encoding" parameters.  When unspecified, these defaulted to the current machine's default charset.  It should default to UTF-8 instead.
